home.title: Ethan Ozelius
home.description: Just a drifting computer hacker trying to get some sunshine.
home.subtext: - Software Engineer learning by building and embracing the unknown.  When I'm not coding, I'm probably hiking the Hudson Valley, skating in a hockey game or doing some carpentry.

portfolio.title: Ethan Ozelius Portfolio
portfolio.description: Open source projects, Games and Demo Apps

minesweeper.title: Minesweeeper
minesweeper.description: Classic minesweeper game that is fully customizable for size and difficulty.  Built in Vue.js, dockerized and deployed into AWS with Nginx.

weather.title: 5 day weather forcast - now with more freezing rain
weather.description: Simple 5 day weather app for New York city.  Bootstrapped with Create-react-app, dockerized and deployed into AWS with Nginx.

medium.title: Musings of a drifting hacker
medium.description: I write, usually with a technical twist, hopefully funny, but if nothing else it's saved on the internet forever.
